meanings.definition: Only one in number; not one of several.
meanings.sent1: She lived in a single house with her family.
meanings.sent2: He wanted to buy a single ticket for the movie.
meanings.sent3: The single cookie left in the jar tempted her.
meanings.sent4: His single goal in life was to travel the world.
meanings.sent5: The single star shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Unmarried or not involved in a romantic relationship.
meanings.sent1: She was happy being single and independent.
meanings.sent2: He preferred the single life over being in a relationship.
meanings.sent3: The single friend in the group always gave great advice.
meanings.sent4: Her heart remained single despite many suitors.
meanings.sent5: The single man enjoyed his solitude in the mountains.

meanings.definition: A hit song released separately from an album.
meanings.sent1: Her favorite single played on the radio all day.
meanings.sent2: The new single by the band quickly climbed the charts.
meanings.sent3: The single became an instant earworm for everyone.
meanings.sent4: His single topped the music charts for weeks.
meanings.sent5: The catchy single stuck in her head for days.
